title: Border, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Alençon with a design of small-scale floral shapes edged by a garland on one side. Fond: réseau ordinaire. Modes: venises, enchainettes, St. Esprit avec rangs clairs. Pattern outlined by cordonnet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: linen
